topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: Scientific Mail Transfer Agent
short_description: "mta" is a scientific project done by experienced students of computer science. It aims to create an intelligent mail transfer agent (SMTP only). Development language is Java. The mta should be resistant against spam attacks, and mail bouncing.
